unnormalised: Ayurveda sounds interesting! Has anyone tried it for real? My dadi swears by it. She went to a clinic in Kerala back in 2010 and says it changed her life. Heard good things about Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala too. Anyone know costs? My friend Priya wants to try something before her wedding on 22/12/2024. Might be good to check availability after 18:00 hrs as well. Let me know!
